"What if I could see the future of my career path? Would it change how I approach my current job or help me make better decisions about where to go next?"
"What if I could see the outcome of a major decision? Would it change my perspective on the situation and lead me down a different path?"
"What if I could see the consequences of my actions? Would it motivate me to make more responsible choices and avoid negative outcomes?"
"What if I could see the impact of my donations? Would it motivate me to give more and support causes that matter most to me?"
"What if I could see the consequences of my relationships? Would it motivate me to cultivate healthier connections and prioritize meaningful interactions?"
